data.name: TooltipRaceVariantIsPersistentToggleButton
data.value: Enable this to persist this variant to a file. Only one variant can be marked as persistent at a time.

data.name: TooltipRaceVariantKeepWhileCalculationToggleButton
data.value: Enable this to keep this variant while calculating new race variants.

data.name: TooltipRaceVariantIsPersistentIcon
data.value: Persist this variant to a file. Only one variant can be marked as persistent at a time.

data.name: TooltipRaceVariantKeepWhileCalculation
data.value: Keep this variant while calculating new race variants.

data.name: TooltipRaceVariantContainsError
data.value: This variant contains errors.

data.name: TooltipNumberOfSwimLanes
data.value: Number of available swim lanes. This is used during calculation of the race variants (determines the maximum number of parallel starts).

data.name: TooltipNumberRacesVariantsAfterCalculation
data.value: Number of variants after calculation. The number of variants to keep (marked with the pin icon) is subtracted before calculating the remaining elements.

data.name: TooltipMaxRacesVariantCalculationLoops
data.value: Maximum number of iterations the race variant calculation loop will run in the worst case. If the number of variants after calculation is reached earlier, the loop will break.

data.name: TooltipMinRacesVariantsScore
data.value: Only variants with a score higher or equal this value (in percent) are kept during calculation.

data.name: TooltipCompetitionYear
data.value: Year in which the competition takes place. This year is used to find the correct competition for each start.

data.name: TooltipTemplatePathCertificate
data.value: Path to the certificate template. Relative paths are relative to the workspace path.

data.name: TooltipDocumentOutputFolder
data.value: Output folder where the documents are created. Relative paths are relative to the workspace path.

data.name: TooltipTemplatePathOverviewList
data.value: Path to the overview list template. Relative paths are relative to the workspace path.

data.name: TooltipTemplatePathRaceStartList
data.value: Path to the race start list template. Relative paths are relative to the workspace path.

data.name: TooltipTemplatePathResultList
data.value: Path to the result list template. Relative paths are relative to the workspace path.

data.name: TooltipTemplatePathTimeForms
data.value: Path to the time forms template. Relative paths are relative to the workspace path.

data.name: TooltipWorkspaceOpen
data.value: Open a workspace and load all settings, persons, competitions...

data.name: TooltipWorkspaceOpenInExplorer
data.value: Open the folder of the current workspace in the windows explorer.

data.name: TooltipWorkspaceSave
data.value: Save all workspace settings, persons, competitions, ... to a file.

data.name: TooltipWorkspaceClose
data.value: Close the current workspace. If there are unsaved changes, there will be a dialog before closing.

data.name: TooltipTemplatePathResultListDetail
data.value: Path to the result list detail template. Relative paths are relative to the workspace path.

data.name: TooltipPlaceholderMarker
data.value: String marker for placeholders in the template files. The placeholder must be enclosed by this marker. e.g. PlaceholderMarker = "%" --> %PLACEHOLDER%

data.name: TooltipDocumentFileTypes
data.value: File types of documents that will be created.

data.name: TooltipTemplateFilenamePostfix
data.value:
This string is removed from the template file name to get the final output file name. If filters are used during document creation, this string defines the place where the filter criteria are inserted in the output file name.
e.g. Template File: "Certificates_Template.docx", Template Postfix: "_Template" -> Output file (without filters): "Certificates.docx" -> Output file (with filters by style): "Certificates_Breaststroke.docx"

data.name: TooltipWeightSingleStarts
data.value: Weight for the score for single starts (The less races with only one start the better).

data.name: TooltipWeightSameStyleSequence
data.value: Weight for the score for same styles in sequence (The more consecutive races with the same style the better).

data.name: TooltipWeightPersonStartPauses
data.value: Weight for the score for person pauses (The more pause between the starts of a person the better).

data.name: TooltipWeightStyleOrder
data.value: Weight for the score for style order (There is a preferred order for the styles. The more the races follow this order, the better.).

data.name: TooltipWeightStartGenders
data.value: Weight for the score for start genders (Homogenous genders in starts are better than heterogeneous ones).

data.name: TooltipPriorityStyleBreaststroke
data.value: Priority used for style breaststroke during score calculation (step style order). Lower numbers should start earlier.

data.name: TooltipPriorityStyleFreestyle
data.value: Priority used for style breaststroke during score calculation (step style order). Lower numbers should start earlier.

data.name: TooltipPriorityStyleBackstroke
data.value: Priority used for style backstroke during score calculation (step style order). Lower numbers should start earlier.

data.name: TooltipPriorityStyleButterfly
data.value: Priority used for style butterfly during score calculation (step style order). Lower numbers should start earlier.

data.name: TooltipPriorityStyleMedley
data.value: Priority used for style medley during score calculation (step style order). Lower numbers should start earlier.

data.name: TooltipPriorityStyleWaterflea
data.value: Priority used for style waterflea during score calculation (step style order). Lower numbers should start earlier.

data.name: TooltipBrowse
data.value: Browse for file or folder.

data.name: TooltipShowResolvedPath
data.value: Show resolved path

data.name: TooltipHideResolvedPath
data.value: Hide resolved path

data.name: TooltipTimeInputMillisecondDigits
data.value: Number of digits for the time input Millisecond.

data.name: TooltipScoreFractionalDigits
data.value: Number of fractional digits to use for the score. The score is directly rounded while calculation, so that all occurences use the same number of digits.

data.name: TooltipOpenDocument
data.value: Open document in default application. Open .pdf if available, otherwise use .docx.

data.name: TooltipMaxAgeCompetition
data.value: This start is using a competition that was selected, because the person is older than all available competitions for this style and gender. The competition with the highest age is used then.

data.name: TooltipPageInfoWorkspacePage
data.value:
The workspace is a folder where all settings, competitions, and people are saved. It's a good idea to create a new folder for each competition (e.g. each year). It doesn't matter where the folder is located on the hard drive.
The following files are created: - WorkspaceSettings.json: JSON file with all settings for the workspace. - Person.csv: List of all people and swim times. - Competitions.csv: List of all available competitions. - BestRace.csv: The race marked as a good option is saved here. If no race has been marked, this file doesn't exist. Of course, other files can be stored here (e.g. templates).
On this page, you can select the current workspace folder and save all changes. Furthermore, all settings for various aspects of the software can be configured and reset here.

data.name: TooltipPageInfoCompetitionPage
data.value: All available competitions are defined on this page. A competition is described by the style, the distance, the age, and a corresponding time. The time is then used to calculate points. If the swimmer achieves exactly the time entered here, they receive 100 points. If they swim slower, they receive fewer points; if they swim faster, they receive more. A corresponding competition must be available for each start.

data.name: TooltipPageInfoPeoplePage
data.value: All entries can be entered on this page. The registration requires the name, year of birth, and the desired style. A corresponding competition must also be entered for each style! Otherwise, the start will be ignored (also highlighted here).

data.name: TooltipPageInfoPrepareRacesPage
data.value: On this page, you can create a order for the starts. This can be done either manually (by adding a variant and manually dragging the starts from the right area to the middle) or automatically (variants are randomly created and evaluated according to various criteria). Each race variant is scored from 0% (poor) to 100% (perfect). In the workspace, you can set the weighting or various parameters for the automatic calculation. You can also highlight specific starts. For example, all of a person's starts to check whether there are enough breaks.

data.name: TooltipPageInfoTimeInputPage
data.value: For each start, you can enter the swim time here (in minutes, seconds, and tenths of a second). Various filter options are available.

data.name: TooltipPageInfoResultsPage
data.value: This page displays the results from all starts (the number of points awarded for each swim time). It is also possible to determine the best swimmers in a particular style.

data.name: TooltipPageInfoCreateDocumentsPage
data.value: On this page, you can create various documents that are required before, during, or after the competition. The filter only applies to certificate creation. It also provides an overview of all available placeholders that can be used in the documents.

data.name: TooltipCompetitionDate
data.value: Complete date on which the competition takes place. This is only used during document creation as info text.

data.name: TooltipNotExactAgeCompetition
data.value: This start is using a competition that was selected, because there was no available competition for this style and gender with the exact age of the person.

data.name: TooltipCompetitionSearchMode
data.value: Search mode that defines how the correct competition for a start is found.

data.name: TooltipPersonActiveInactiveButton
data.value: Set all starts of the person to active or inactive.

data.name: TooltipPersonInactiveStart
data.value: This start of the person is inactive.

data.name: TooltipNoTimeSet
data.value: No time was set yet (time is zero).

data.name: TooltipDuplicatePerson
data.value: There was at least one other person with the same basic parameters found.

data.name: TooltipEmptyPerson
data.value: This person has no starts.

data.name: TooltipPersonInactive
data.value: This person is inactive.

data.name: TooltipCleanupRaces
data.value: Remove non-existing and inactive starts from all races. Also delete empty races.

data.name: TooltipAddNewRaceToRaceVariant
data.value: Add new race for the current race variant.

data.name: TooltipRaceVariantAdd
data.value: Add a new race variant.

data.name: TooltipRaceVariantRemove
data.value: Remove the current race variant.

data.name: TooltipRaceVariantCopy
data.value: Copy the current race variant.

data.name: TooltipRaceVariantsReorder
data.value: Sort the complete list of race variants descending by their scores.

data.name: TooltipRaceVariantsCalculate
data.value: Calculate new race variants depending on the settings of the workspace. The race variant marked as best variant and all variants marked to keep during calculation are untouched.

data.name: TooltipShortPauseThreshold
data.value: If two starts of a person have less pause than this number, the pause is regarded short. This leads to a bad score for the race variant.

data.name: TooltipFriendGroups
data.value: A friend group defines which persons are friends. This information is used during race calculation to prefer races with friends as competitors.

data.name: TooltipWeightFriendship
data.value: Weight for the score for friendships (The more friends start together in the same race the better).

data.name: TooltipAnalyticsWidgetAgeDistribution
data.value: Analyse how many people per birth year have started. Only active persons are regarded.

data.name: TooltipAnalyticsWidgetGenderPersons
data.value: Analyse the percentage of male/female persons. Only active persons are regarded.

data.name: TooltipAnalyticsWidgetGenderStarts
data.value: Analyse the percentage of male/female starts. Only valid starts are regarded (active and competition assigned).

data.name: TooltipAnalyticsWidgetStartsPerPerson
data.value: Analyse the number of starts per person. Only valid starts are regarded (active and competition assigned).

data.name: TooltipAnalyticsWidgetPersonCounters
data.value: Analyse the number of active and inactive persons.

data.name: TooltipAnalyticsWidgetStartsCounters
data.value: Analyse the number of active and inactive starts.

data.name: TooltipAnalyticsWidgetDistancesBetweenStarts
data.value: Analyse the distances between the starts of a person. Only active starts are regarded.

data.name: TooltipAnalyticsWidgetStartsPerStyle
data.value: Analyse how many starts per style are available. Only valid starts are regarded (active and competition assigned).

data.name: TooltipAnalyticsWidgetStartDistances
data.value: Analyse how many starts per distance are available. Only valid starts are regarded (active and competition assigned).

data.name: TooltipAnalyticsWidgetPlacesAgeDistribution
data.value: Analyse the birth year for each result place.

data.name: TooltipPageInfoAnalyticsPage
data.value: Various analytics can be found on this page. These analytics depend on different data aspects entered on the other pages. For more details about the single analytics refer to the info on the specific widget.

data.name: TooltipAnalyticsWidgetRacesAges
data.value: Analyse the birth years for each race

data.name: TooltipTemplatePathAnalytics
data.value: Path to the analytics template. Relative paths are relative to the workspace path.

data.name: TooltipWorkspaceNew
data.value: Create a new workspace including the necessary configuration files and when requested the default templates.

data.name: TooltipDocumentsSinglePage
data.value: Only a single page will be created for the data of this document type (or, if the content becomes too long, there will be multiple pages).

data.name: TooltipDocumentsMultiplePages
data.value: Multiple pages will be created for the data of this document type (one page for each data item, e.g. one page per person).

data.name: TooltipDocumentsTextPlaceholdersSupported
data.value: Text placeholders are supported by this document type. Text placeholders are simply replaced where they occur in the document. The replacement data is determined by the placeholder name.

data.name: TooltipDocumentsTablePlaceholdersSupported
data.value: Table placeholders are supported by this document type. Table placeholders must be inside a table of the document. All tables in the document that contain at least one supported placeholder will be processed. The first row that contains a placeholder will be used as a pattern for the new rows. There will be a new row for each data item. The replacement data is determined by the placeholder name.

data.name: TooltipDistanceInvalid
data.value: No valid distance was found. Make sure, there is a distance rule for the age and swimming style.

data.name: TooltipDuplicateCompetition
data.value: There was at least one other competition with the same basic parameters found.

data.name: CompetitionDistanceDeterminedByCompetitionDistanceRuleString
data.value: The competition distance is determined by the first matching competition distance rule.
